title: Number is divisible | Challenge
description: In Python, we can use the modulo operator (%) to check if a number is divisible by another number. If the remainder is equal to 0, then the number is divisible. In this challenge, you will create a function that checks if a number is divisible by another number.

meta.title: Divisibility Challenge: Mastering the Modulo Operator in Python
meta.description: Learn how to use the modulo operator in Python to determine if a number is divisible by another number.
